name: Great Wyk
text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Balon Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Renown. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, shuffle that card into its owner's deck.

flavor: "If there are rocks to starboard and a storm to port, a wise captain steers a third course."
name: Asha Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Stealth. Each other unique Ironborn character you control gains stealth.

name: Priest of Old Wyk
text: While there is a Drowned God character in your dead pile, Priest of Old Wyk contributes its STR to your total for dominance even while kneeling.

name: Orkmont Reaver
text:
Pillage.
While an opponent has 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile, Orkmont Reaver gains stealth.

name: What Is Dead May Never Die
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a [greyjoy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.

designer: Card design by 2008 Melee World Champion, Tzu-Mainn Chen.
name: When I Woke...
text: Reaction: After a player loses a [military] challenge, that player chooses a participating character and places it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

name: Sea of Blood
text: During [military] challenges, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1 for each blood token on Sea of Blood. You cannot play events during [intrigue] or [power] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to place a blood token on Sea of Blood. Then, search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: We Take Westeros!
text: When Revealed: Choose a location in a discard pile and put it into play under your control.

name: Stolen Message
text: Each opponent plays with the top card of his or her deck revealed. Action: Pay 1 gold to place the top card of an opponent's deck on the bottom of that player's deck. (Limit 3 times per round.)
